Melt distribution

meltDistributionTable.Rd

Takes a LiPD model distribution and melt it into a single data.frame

meltDistributionTable(this.dist, dist.plot = 1:length(this.dist))

Arguments

this.dist

LiPD "distributionTable" object
dist.plot

vector of distribution tables to plot

Value

data.frame of melted distribution objects.

See also

Other plot help: AD2BP_trans(), BP2AD_trans(), axisLabel(), bin2d(), geoChronRPlotTheme(), getLegend(), getPlotRanges(), kde2d(), modeSelektor(), periodAnnotate(), quantile2d(), reverselog10_trans()

Author

Nick McKay
